@d3w10n
Most people use the default installation path that's why "Automated Cracking 1" works for most people.
However some might change its path, and that's why "Automated Cracking 2" works in these cases, as you are able to choose where to deploy the crack.

If you go to "How To Use Guide" you will find at the bottom of it the full description on how both methods works and when to use each one :)
